Class MiniBatchRegime

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.DelegatedRegime
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.MiniBatchRegime
All Implemented Interfaces:
Regime
@Strategy(CONCRETE) public final class MiniBatchRegime extends DelegatedRegime
A Regime decorator that performs training using mini-batches.

This regime splits the DataSet into smaller contiguous subsets (mini-batches) of a configurable size. It then delegates training to the wrapped regime once per mini-batch. This provides a compromise between full-batch training (using the entire dataset at once) and online (stochastic) training (using a single sample at a time).

Behavior

  • The dataset is divided into sequential chunks of size getSamplesPerLearning().
  • For each chunk, the delegate Regime is invoked with that subset.
  • If the dataset size is not divisible by the batch size, the last mini-batch will contain the remaining samples.
See Also:
  • DelegatedRegime

    • train

      public <E extends EstimationFunction> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer)
      Trains the given estimation function by dividing the dataset into mini-batches and delegating training to the wrapped regime for each batch.
      Type Parameters:
      E - the type of estimation function
      Parameters:
      estimationFunction - the model to train
      trainingSet - the dataset to split into mini-batches
      objective - the objective (loss) function
      optimizer - the optimizer to apply updates
